post0.title: Get Data
post0.content: %load_ext autoreload %autoreload 2 . Path.pdfls = lambda x: [x for x in list(x.iterdir()) if x.suffix == ".pdf"] Path.ls = lambda x: list(x.iterdir()) . Get List of Books and Download Links . sheet_name = "History" books_list = ( f"https://api.steinhq.com/v1/storages/5fd49704f62b6004b3eb63a3/{sheet_name}" ) r = requests.get(books_list) . . ncert_history_books = [Book(**x) for x in json.loads(r.text)] . . Download and Extract all Books . for book in tqdm(ncert_history_books): book.download("../data/raw") book.unzip("../data/extract") . . single_book = ncert_history_books[0] . pdf_files = [] for folder in single_book.extract_to_path.ls(): pdf_files.extend(folder.pdfls()) pdf_files.sort() pdf_files = [ file for file in pdf_files if file.stem[-2:].isdigit() ] # keep the chapter files, nothing else pdf_files . from typing import List import pdfplumber def pdf_to_text(file: Path) -> List[str]: page_texts = [] with pdfplumber.open(file) as pdf: for page in pdf.pages[3:5]: txt = page.extract_text() txt = " ".join(txt.split(" n")) page_texts.append(txt) return page_texts for file in pdf_files: plain_text = pdf_to_text(file) print(plain_text) . # ncert_history_books[1].unzip() .

page1.content: This website is powered by fastpages 1. . a blogging platform that natively supports Jupyter notebooks in addition to other formats. ↩ . |
